oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: A Word With The Great Ones - Army Recruiting Service interviews - Grand Ole Opry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of interviews with Charlie Louvin (performer), Duane Dee (performer), and Loretta Lynn (performer), recorded for Army Recruiting Service backstage at the Grand Ole Opry.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement -- [Unidentified] introduces Charlie Louvin -- Army Recruiting Service advertisement -- Lt. Don Hetzler introduces Charlie Louvin -- Louvin talks about the country music community being a family and getting along together -- Louvin talks about recording with the Louvin Brothers and all the success he has had -- Louvin talks about all the qualities one learns from serving in the armed forces -- Lt. Don Hetzler concludes the interview -- Closing theme -- Opening statement -- [Unidentified] introduces Duane Dee -- Army Recruiting Service advertisement -- Lt. Hetzler introduces Duane Dee -- Duane Dee talks about the sad content of a lot of country music -- Dee talks about the experience of being a new artist on the country music scene -- Dee talks about the first time he heard one of his recording on the radio -- Dee talks about being enlisted in the army reserve and the local Nashville police unit -- Lt. Hetzler concludes the interview -- Closing theme -- Opening statement -- [Unidentified] introduces Loretta Lynn -- Army Recruiting Service advertisement -- Lt. Hetzler introduces Loretta Lynn -- Lynn talks about her respect for those serving in the armed forces -- Lynn talks about sending music overseas to those serving -- Lynn talks about some of her older tunes -- Lynn talks about staying true to her country roots and reflecting this in her music -- Lynn talks about her songwriting process -- Lt. Hetzler concludes the interview -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Dee, Duane; Lynn, Loretta, 1932-;
